display static-user ip-address 203.0.113.196

  Interface                :    Eth-Trunk1.3653
  VLAN ID                  :    3653
  Static user IP address   :    203.0.113.196
  Static user Gateway      :    203.0.113.1
  Static user description  :    -
  Static user MAC address  :    -
  Static user domain       :    ipoe-b2b-xrad
  Initiative detect        :    On
  Export the route         :    On
  Static user status       :    Detecting
  Vpn Instance             :    -
  Keep Online              :    No
  Detcet slot              :    1
  Detect status            :    ARP
<HW-BRAS>
